name: 20000 Leaks Under The Sea
description:
🚨 Keep water out of your submarine by patching leaks, then get to the surface! The longer you weld, the longer leaks hold. Once your vessel's seaworthy, pull the lever to turn her on and get the heck to safety! How to Play
  • Run: left and right arrow keys
  • Climb Ladders: up and down arrow keys
  • Patch Holes with Blow Torch: hold down space bar
  • Pull Lever: hold down space bar
  • Options: escape key
  • New Game: N key
Jam Details
  • Completed in under 72 hours, with original graphics and sound
  • Theme: Running out of Space
  • Game Engine: Unity
  • Graphics: Photoshop and Illustrator
  • Music & Sound Effects: Garageband, YMCK Magical 8-Bit Plug-in, BFXR
The Team

Sean Lange // Wes Rulvacaba // Marissa Epstein // Hunter MacDermut

We would really appreciate if you tried it out and gave us a rating on Ludum Dare. Thanks!
